name: Minecraft Velocity Proxy
description: Velocity proxy server powered by itzg/bungeecord.
composeInline:
services:
  velocity:
    image: itzg/bungeecord:latest
    container_name: vestri-{{SERVER_SLUG}}
    ports:
      - "25577:25577"
    environment:
      TYPE: "VELOCITY"
    volumes:
      - ./data:/server
    stdin_open: true
    tty: true
    restart: unless-stopped
    networks:
      - velocity
networks:
  velocity:
    name: "{{VELOCITY_NETWORK}}"

configFiles.title: velocity.toml
configFiles.defaultContent:
bind = "0.0.0.0:25577"
motd = "A Vestri Velocity Proxy"
show-max-players = 500
online-mode = true
player-info-forwarding-mode = "modern"
servers = {}
try = []
